entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
